intro: Tristaniopsis kinabaluensis, commonly known as the Kinabalu tristaniopsis, is a rare and endemic species found exclusively in the high-altitude forests of Mount Kinabalu in Borneo. It belongs to the family Arecaceae, commonly known as the palm family, and is characterized by its tall, slender trunk and feather-like leaves.
